description: Lets get some Mana production going.
/b/Generating Flora/b/ are flowers that /6/produce mana/6/. The /b/Lexica Botanica/b/ has a full list on those, but some you can start off with are the /b/Endoflame/b/ and /b/Hydrogenas/b/.
The /b/Endoflame/b/ takes nearby fuel on the ground and /6/burns/6/ them for Mana.
The /b/Hydrogenas/b/ /6/absorbs mana from nearby water/6/ passively, until it dies after a few days.
Either or both will get you some basic mana produciton. But now you have to put it somewhere.
Bind the flowers to a nearby /b/Mana Spreader/b/. Mana Spreaders take mana and then fire them in a blast at whatever they are binded to.
You'll likely want a Mana pool as the destination for them.
